mapper.select: SELECT R.RSVT_CD, R.RSVT_DT, R.RSVT_TIME, R.RSVT_REASON, R.EMP_NO, R.PA_NO, R.RSVT_STATE, P.PA_NAME, E.EMP_NAME FROM RESERVATION R JOIN PATIENT P ON R.PA_NO = P.PA_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON R.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO WHERE TRUNC(R.RSVT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(RSVT_TIME) ASC

SELECT R.RSVT_CD, R.RSVT_DT, R.RSVT_REASON, R.EMP_NO, R.PA_NO, R.RSVT_STATE, R.RSVT_TIME, P.PA_REG, P.PA_NAME, P.PA_SEX, P.PA_PH, P.PA_ADD1, P.PA_ADD2, P.PZ_ZIP, P.PA_NOKNM, P.PA_NOKPH, P.PA_BLD_TYPE, P.PA_INSR_YN, P.PA_ADM_DT, P.PA_HEIGHT, P.PA_WEIGHT FROM RESERVATION R JOIN PATIENT P ON R.PA_NO = P.PA_NO WHERE TRUNC(R.RSVT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(RSVT_TIME) ASC

SELECT 'RV' || TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(MAX(RSVT_CD),3)+1,'0000')) AS RSVT_CD FROM RESERVATION
INSERT INTO RESERVATION (RSVT_CD, RSVT_DT, RSVT_REASON, EMP_NO, PA_NO, RSVT_STATE, RSVT_TIME) VALUES (#{rsvtCd}, #{rsvtDt}, #{rsvtReason}, #{empNo}, #{paNo}, 'RVST01', #{rsvtTime})
mapper.select: SELECT R.RSVT_CD, R.RSVT_DT, R.RSVT_REASON, R.PA_NO, R.RSVT_STATE, R.RSVT_TIME, P.PA_NAME FROM RESERVATION R JOIN PATIENT P ON R.PA_NO = P.PA_NO WHERE TRUNC(RSVT_DT) = TRUNC(#{rsvtDt}) AND EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY RSVT_TIME
